articles.title: Pixel Tablet could include support for third-party styluses - The Verge
articles.description: Google’s upcoming Pixel Tablet might support the cross-manufacturer USI (Universal Stylus Initiative) standard. It’s appeared in the USI’s list of certified products, meaning it could be used with third-party styluses.
